name: Lil Duke's Scoop Stacker
description:
*Please Note: This game is UNFINISHED. As of right now, development will not continue. However, cleaning up the compile errors so I could post this build refueled my desired to finish. Maybe one day!*

This is Lil Duke's Scoop Stacker! Catch as many falling ice cream scoops as you can in one minute! But BE CAREFUL! Ice Cream scoops aren't the only things falling. Avoid the "Frenemies"! Frenemies are falling vegetables, and NO ONE wants vegetables with their ice cream.

The more points you earn, the more SCOOP TOKENS you will receive. Scoop Tokens can then be used in the Rewards Shop for Coupons that you can redeem at Lil Duke's Ice Cream Shop (at leas that was the intention. The Rewards Shop is empty in this build.)

This game was originally built as a promotional tool for my family's ice cream shop. All the flavors you can catch are flavors that are available in store. The "Scoop Tokens" had real life counterparts that inspired the game. Scoop Tokens were able to be used in our store as currency to purchase a small, one scoop ice cream. The idea for this game was to incentivize players (our customers) to return to the shop with the rewards they earned in game.
